data.actual_result: One takes you to Discord's homepage while the other takes you to invalid invite screen
data.expected_result: Both links should take you to the same page, as they have the same invite code
data.short_description: If you open in browser an invite link formatted as `discord(dot)gg/XXXX` with XXXX containing invalid characters (such as ' or &), you will be taken to discord's website homepage, while it does display the invalid invite screen if you're using the `discordapp(dot)com/invite/XXXX` format of same invite
data.steps_to_repro: - Copy the following invite link (make sure to replace (dot) with an actual dot) : `https://discord(dot)gg/abc&def` - Paste it in browser URL bar and hit Enter - Notice how you're redirected to homepage - Now copy the following invite link : `https://discordapp(dot)com/invite/abc&def` - Notice how this takes you to the invalid invite screen
